conclusion: Analyze the flow of liquid through channels A, B, C, and D to predict which container (E, F, or G) it will flow into.
Observe the arrows labeled A, B, C, and D pointing to different containers (E, F, or G).
The arrows indicate the direction of flow from A, B, C, and D.
Determine which container the liquid will flow into based on the direction of the arrows.
The liquid will flow into container G after passing through the baffles.
